alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 4:12PM AKST until March 01 at 7:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Copper River Basin from Glennallen south. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 7 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow amounts are expected along the Richardson Highway south of Glennallen and along the Edgerton Highway and McCarthy Road. Snow will develop Tuesday night, with the heaviest snowfall rates expected Wednesday morning. The snow is then expected to slowly taper off through late Wednesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
